name: Time
description:
Includes 3 o'clock, 5 past 12 (classify both numbers as time),  5:09, 13:00-14:00

Does not include durations (e.g. 60 minutes)

name: Short Date
description:
23.4.09 16/4, Aug-2008, and also American equivalents.

Includes ranges, e.g.  21-23/4/08   31/8-2/9

Select the appropriate subcategory

name: Day of Month
description: Includes 23rd November, April 6, 23-25 April, 1st of the month

name: Month
description: Anywhere a month is written as a number on its own (not in a short date)

name: Year
description:
1998, '98, 98, 1976-7, 1980s

Does not include 'in the company's 3rd year' (that's an ordinal).

name: Duration
description: 60 minutes, 90 days, 30 years., 3 to 4 days, 45-50 minutes, 3-year.

name: Ordinal
description:
1st, 3rd, 84th.

Does not include Day of Month

name: Cardinal
description:
3 people, 17 companies, 9 out of 10 cats, Elvis was number 1 that week, 3 times our profit last year.

30mph, 16 kg, 800Mb., 4.0 GPA (American 'Grade Point Average'- school grade),
24Â° (Temperature or Angle, but not Latitude/Longitude - that's a Map Position)

Includes numbers within sums (but not fractions). Does not include currency.

name: Chemical Formula
description:
H2SO4,  2NaCl etc.

Only use for molecular formulae. If used within a name, e.g. "2-Bromo-1-chloropropane" that should be labelled as an ID.

name: Fraction
description:
1/2 1/4  56/120

Does not include whole numbers that are followed by fractions, e.g. the 1 in '1 3/4' - that's a Cardinal Number

name: House Number
description:
House numbers, flat numbers etc. e.g. 
54 Kings Parade, Flat 5

Does not include postal/zip codes, or examples such as '5th Avenue' - that's an Ordinal.

name: Post Code/ZIP
description: CB2, 90210. Use for equivalent codes in any country.

name: Currency
description:
Â£30, $50, 60 GBP, 40 dollars, 10p, â‚¬ 30

Also include prices per item such as "Â£30/jar" - but do not include ones where not all of the digits are currency, e.g. "Â£5/3 rides" - these should be labelled 'Other'

name: Numbered List
description:
1) 2) 3) (or 1. 2. 3. or similar)

Also use for Chapter Numbers, Section numbers etc.

Use both for the list items and references back to them (e.g. "Point 2 does not apply")

name: Tel. Number
description:
Includes dialling codes, country codes, extensions.

Includes fax and mobile/cell phones, and pagers, including "Pager Number xxx"

Does not include 'press 1 for option a' etc.

name: Map Position
description:
Latitude and Longitude, OS Grid reference, or any other map coordinate system.

Include references only giving one co-ordinate, e.g. 'The Greenwich Meridian is at longitude 0Â°'.

name: ID
description:
An ID number or reference, referring to a particular object, class of objects, logical grouping etc.

Includes order numbers, account numbers, car registrations, Room numbers, passport numbers. Includes software version numbers (e.g. Firefox 2.0) except for those that are years (Windows 98, Word 2000). 

 Does not include addresses, telephone numbers, chapter/section numbers etc.

name: Idiom
description:
Number with a special meaning, that would not persist if the digits were changed, e.g. 24/7.

Does not include '999', '911' â€“ these are phone numbers.

Does not include significant dates â€“ e.g. 9/11.

name: Email
description: Email address

name: URL
description: Part of a URL

name: Filename
description: Part of a filename

name: Unclear
description: It is unclear which category the number belongs to. Use this when it might belong to several categories, if it seems to need an entirely new category, or when it is impossible to determine what type of number it is.

name: Sport Score
description:
A score from any sport.

Does not include statistics e.g. batting averages, number of goals a player has scored.

name: Day Month
description: Short date with "Day of Month" followed by "Month", with or without a separator.

name: Day Month Year
description: Short date with "Day of Month" followed by "Month" then "Year", with or without  separators.

name: Month Day
description: Short date with "Month" followed by "Day of Month", with or without a separator.

name: Month Day Year
description: Short date with "Month" followed by "Day of Month" then "Year", with or without separators.

name: Month Year
description: Short date with "Month" followed by "Year", with or without a separator.

name: Year Month Day
description: Short date with "Year" followed by "Month" then "Day", with or without separators.

name: Year Day Month
description: Short date with "Year" followed by "Day of Month" then "Month", with or without separators

name: Year Month
description: Short date with "Year" followed by "Month", with or without a separator.

name: Unclear
description: Short date where it is unclear what the correct ordering is.

name: Timezone offset
description: Timezone offsets - e.g. -0700 or +0400 or +4hrs

name: Numbered Road
description:
Roads with associated numbers, e.g. M25, A1, Interstate 30, Route 66.

Does not include 5th Avenue (that's an ordinal)

name: Percentage
description:
5.4% rise, 20 percent of users

Does not include '4 out of every hundred' or '5 per 1000'
